trans-unit.source: Adding this attribute to a method within an XML Web service created using ASP.NET makes the method callable from remote Web clients.
trans-unit.target: 加入這個屬性 (Attribute) 至使用 ASP.NET 建立的 XML Web Service 內的方法，使該方法可從遠端 Web 用戶端呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Methods within a class that have this attribute set are called XML Web service methods.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會設定類別內方法被呼叫 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: The method and class must be public and running inside an ASP.NET Web application.
trans-unit.target: 方法和類別必須是公用、 ASP.NET Web 應用程式內執行。

trans-unit.source: In the example below the method `GetMachineName` can be remotely called across the Web, because it has a <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 在下例方法`GetMachineName`可以跨 Web、 從遠端呼叫，因為它有<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: `GetUserName` cannot be called remotely, because it does not have a <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>, even though it is `public`.
trans-unit.target: `GetUserName` 因為它沒有無法遠端呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>，即使它是`public`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes whether session state is enabled for the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 初始化是否啟用 XML Web Service 方法的工作階段狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes whether session state is enabled for the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 初始化是否啟用 XML Web Service 方法的工作階段狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the transaction support of an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 XML Web Service 方法的交易支援。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A web service call can only be the root of a transaction, due to the stateless nature of the HTTP protocol.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務呼叫只能在交易中，由於 HTTP 通訊協定的無狀態的根目錄。

trans-unit.source: This means that the following two settings are equivalent, with each call creating a new transaction:
trans-unit.target: 這表示每次呼叫建立新的交易是相等的下列兩項設定：

trans-unit.source: It also means that all the following settings are equivalent; meaning no transaction support:
trans-unit.target: 也表示下列所有設定都都相同。這表示沒有交易的支援：

trans-unit.source: Initializes whether session state is enabled for the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 初始化是否啟用 XML Web Service 方法的工作階段狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the transaction support of an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 XML Web Service 方法的交易支援。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the number of seconds the response is cached.
trans-unit.target: 初始化可快取回應的秒數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A web service call can only be the root of a transaction, due to the stateless nature of the HTTP protocol.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務呼叫只能在交易中，由於 HTTP 通訊協定的無狀態的根目錄。

trans-unit.source: This means that the following two settings are equivalent, with each call creating a new transaction:
trans-unit.target: 這表示每次呼叫建立新的交易是相等的下列兩項設定：

trans-unit.source: It also means that all the following settings are equivalent; meaning no transaction support:
trans-unit.target: 也表示下列所有設定都都相同。這表示沒有交易的支援：

trans-unit.source: Initializes whether session state is enabled for the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 初始化是否啟用 XML Web Service 方法的工作階段狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the transaction support of an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 XML Web Service 方法的交易支援。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the number of seconds the response is cached.
trans-unit.target: 初始化可快取回應的秒數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes whether the response for this request is buffered.
trans-unit.target: 初始化這個要求的回應是否緩衝。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A web service call can only be the root of a transaction, due to the stateless nature of the HTTP protocol.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務呼叫只能在交易中，由於 HTTP 通訊協定的無狀態的根目錄。

trans-unit.source: This means that the following two settings are equivalent, with each call creating a new transaction:
trans-unit.target: 這表示每次呼叫建立新的交易是相等的下列兩項設定：

trans-unit.source: It also means that all the following settings are equivalent; meaning no transaction support:
trans-unit.target: 也表示下列所有設定都都相同。這表示沒有交易的支援：

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the response for this request is buffered.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個要求的回應是否緩衝。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the response for this request is buffered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果緩衝這個要求的回應，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.BufferResponse%2A> to `true`, serializes the response of the XML Web service method into a memory buffer until either the response is completely serialized or the buffer is full.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.BufferResponse%2A>至`true`，將 XML Web 服務方法的回應序列化至記憶體緩衝區，直到完全序列化回應，或在緩衝區已滿。

trans-unit.source: Once the response is buffered, it is returned to the XML Web service client over the network.
trans-unit.target: 一旦經過緩衝處理回應，它會透過網路來傳回 XML Web 服務用戶端。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.BufferResponse%2A> is `false`, the response to the XML Web service method is sent back to the client as it is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.BufferResponse%2A>是`false`，會在序列化為 XML Web 服務方法的回應傳送回用戶端。

trans-unit.source: In general, you only want to set <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.BufferResponse%2A> to `false`, if it is known that an XML Web service method returns large amounts of data to the client.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，您只想要設定<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.BufferResponse%2A>至`false`，如果它已知的 XML Web 服務方法會傳回至用戶端大量的資料。

trans-unit.source: For smaller amounts of data, XML Web service performance is better with <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.BufferResponse%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 對於較少量的資料，XML Web 服務效能是較佳<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.BufferResponse%2A>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.BufferResponse%2A> is `false`, SOAP extensions are disabled for the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.BufferResponse%2A>是`false`，XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 擴充功能已停用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.BufferResponse%2A> property to `false` and handles the streaming of a text file back to the client.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.BufferResponse%2A>屬性`false`和處理文字檔案傳回給用戶端的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The code example demonstrates how to stream a large piece of data back to the client using a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例示範如何將串流處理大型資料片段的回到用戶端使用的類別，實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of seconds the response should be held in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定回應保留在快取中應有的秒數。

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds the response should be held in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 秒數，為應該保留在快取中的回應。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0, which means the response is not cached.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0，這表示沒有快取回應。

trans-unit.source: When caching is enabled requests and responses are held in memory on the server for at least the cache duration so caution must be used if you expect requests or responses to be very large or you expect requests to vary widely.
trans-unit.target: 當啟用快取要求和回應會保留在記憶體中的伺服器上至少快取持續時間，所以必須使用注意，如果您預期會有大量的要求或回應或範圍相當廣泛的要求。

trans-unit.source: There are two issues that can affect output caching in an ASP.NET 2.0 Web service application.
trans-unit.target: 有兩個問題會影響 ASP.NET 2.0 Web 服務應用程式中的輸出快取。

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET 2.0 the HTTP method of the test page has changed from GET to POST.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 2.0 中，測試頁的 HTTP 方法已從 GET 變更為 POST。

trans-unit.source: However, POSTs are not normally cached.
trans-unit.target: 但是，POST 通常不會快取。

trans-unit.source: If you change the test page in an ASP.NET 2.0 Web service application to use GET, caching works properly.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 ASP.NET 2.0 Web 服務應用程式中將測試頁變更為使用 GET，快取就可以正確運作。

trans-unit.source: In addition, HTTP indicates that a user agent (the browser or calling application) should be able to override server caching by setting the "Cache-Control" to "no-cache".
trans-unit.target: 另外，表示使用者代理程式 (瀏覽器或呼叫應用程式) 的 HTTP 應該能夠透過將 "Cache-Control" 設定為 "no-cache" 以覆寫伺服器快取。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET applications, therefore, ignore cached results when they find a "no-cache" header.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當 ASP.NET 應用程式發現 "no-cache" 標頭時，便會忽略快取的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following example places the result of the call to the `ServiceUsage` XML Web service method in the cache for 60 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫的結果`ServiceUsage`XML Web service 方法，在快取 60 秒。

trans-unit.source: Any time an XML Web service client executes the `ServiceUsage` XML Web service method during that time, the same result is returned.
trans-unit.target: 任何時候的 XML Web 服務用戶端執行`ServiceUsage`XML Web service 方法，在這段期間，會傳回相同的結果。

trans-unit.source: A descriptive message describing the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 描述訊息，描述 XML Web Service 方法。

trans-unit.source: A descriptive message describing the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 描述訊息，描述 XML Web Service 方法。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The descriptive message is displayed to prospective consumers of the XML Web service when description documents for the XML Web service are generated, such as the Service Description and the Service help page.
trans-unit.target: 描述性訊息會顯示預期的 XML Web 服務的取用者，當產生 XML Web 服務描述文件，例如服務描述和服務說明頁。

trans-unit.source: In the example below, the string `Obtains the Server Computer Name` is used to describe the XML Web service method in the Service Description and Service help page for the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，字串`Obtains the Server Computer Name`用來描述 XML Web service 方法的服務描述和服務說明頁面中的 XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether session state is enabled for an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否啟用 XML Web Service 方法的工作階段狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if session state is enabled for an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用 XML Web Service 方法的工作階段狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In order to store session state in the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState> object, the XML Web service must inherit from <xref:System.Web.Services.WebService> and a <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> applied to the XML Web service method, setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.EnableSession%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要將工作階段狀態儲存在 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>物件、 XML Web 服務必須繼承自<xref:System.Web.Services.WebService>和<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>套用至 XML Web service 方法，設定<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.EnableSession%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: If session state is not needed for an XML Web service method, then disabling it may improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML Web 服務方法都不需要工作階段狀態，然後再停用可能會改善效能。

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service client is uniquely identified by an HTTP cookie returned by an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務所傳回的 HTTP cookie 來唯一識別 XML Web 服務用戶端。

trans-unit.source: In order for an XML Web service to maintain session state for a client, the client must persist the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓用戶端的維護工作階段狀態的 XML Web service，用戶端必須保存 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Clients can receive the HTTP cookie by creating a new instance of <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer> and assigning that to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol.CookieContainer%2A> property of the proxy class before calling the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端可接收 HTTP cookie 所建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>並指派以<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol.CookieContainer%2A>proxy 類別，然後再呼叫 XML Web service 方法的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you need to maintain session state beyond when the proxy class instance goes out of scope, the client must persist the HTTP cookie between calls to the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要維護超過工作階段狀態，當超出範圍的 proxy 類別執行個體時，用戶端必須保存到 XML Web 服務的呼叫之間的 HTTP cookie。

trans-unit.source: For instance, a Web Forms client can persist the HTTP cookie by saving the <xref:System.Net.CookieContainer> in its own session state.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，Web Form 用戶端可以保存的 HTTP cookie 儲存<xref:System.Net.CookieContainer>在它自己的工作階段狀態。

trans-unit.source: Because not all XML Web services use session state and thus clients are not always required to use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol.CookieContainer%2A> property of a client proxy, the documentation for the XML Web service should state whether session state is used.
trans-unit.target: 因為並非所有的 XML Web 服務會使用工作階段狀態，因此用戶端不一定需要使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol.CookieContainer%2A>用戶端 proxy 的屬性，XML Web service 的文件應該指明是否會使用工作階段狀態。

trans-unit.source: The example below uses session state to determine how many times a particular session accesses the XML Web service method `SessionHitCounter`.
trans-unit.target: 下例使用工作階段狀態，以判斷多少次特定的工作階段存取 XML Web service 方法`SessionHitCounter`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a Web Forms client of an XML Web service that uses session state.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是使用工作階段狀態的 XML Web service 的 Web Form 用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The client persists the HTTP cookie that uniquely identifies the session by storing it in the client's session state.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端持續發生，可唯一識別工作階段，將它儲存在用戶端的工作階段狀態的 HTTP cookie。

trans-unit.source: The name used for the XML Web service method in the data passed to and returned from an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 在 XML Web Service 方法中傳遞並傳回的資料中，XML Web Service 方法所使用的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name used for the XML Web service method in the data passed to and from an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 在對 XML Web Service 方法來回傳遞的資料中，XML Web Service 方法所使用的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is the name of the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 XML Web Service 方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.MessageName%2A> property can be used to alias method or property names.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.MessageName%2A>屬性可以用來別名方法或屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The most common use of the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.MessageName%2A> property will be to uniquely identify polymorphic methods.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的用法<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.MessageName%2A>屬性可唯一識別多型的方法。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.MessageName%2A> is set to the name of the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.MessageName%2A>會設為 XML Web 服務方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if an XML Web service contains two or more XML Web service methods with the same name, you can uniquely identify the individual XML Web service methods by setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.MessageName%2A> to a name unique within the XML Web service, without changing the name of the actual method name in code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果 XML Web service 包含具有相同名稱的兩個或多個 XML Web service 方法，您可以透過唯一識別個別的 XML Web service 方法設定<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.MessageName%2A>XML Web 服務，而不需要變更的名稱中唯一的名稱在程式碼中的實際方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: When data is passed to an XML Web service it is sent in a request and when it is returned it is sent in a response.
trans-unit.target: 資料傳遞至 XML Web service 時它會傳送要求並傳送回應中傳回時。

trans-unit.source: Within the request and response, the name used for the XML Web service method is its <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.MessageName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在要求和回應，使用 XML Web service 方法的名稱是其<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.MessageName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The message name associated with an XML Web service method must be unique within the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務方法相關聯的訊息名稱必須是 XML Web 服務中唯一的。

trans-unit.source: If a new XML Web serivce method with the same name but different parameters is added after clients are calling the original method, a different message name should be specified for the new method but the original message name should be left as is to ensure compatability with existing clients.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端呼叫原始方法之後，就會加入新的 XML Web service 方法具有相同名稱但不同的參數，應該為新方法指定不同的訊息名稱，但保留原始的訊息名稱，以確保相容性與現有的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: In the example below, <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.MessageName%2A> is used to disambiguate the two `Add` methods.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.MessageName%2A>用來區分兩個`Add`方法。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the transaction support of an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 指示 XML Web Service 方法的交易支援。

trans-unit.source: The transaction support of an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: XML Web Service 方法的交易支援。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption.Disabled" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption.Disabled" />。

trans-unit.source: XML Web service methods can only participate as the root object in a transaction, due to the stateless nature of the HTTP protocol.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務方法可以只做為根物件，在交易中，由於 HTTP 通訊協定的無狀態。

trans-unit.source: XML Web service methods can invoke COM objects that participate in the same transaction as the XML Web service method, if the COM object is marked to run within a transaction in the Component Services administrative tool.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務方法可以叫用加入做為 XML Web service 方法，在相同交易中的 COM 物件，如果 COM 物件標記為 [元件服務] 系統管理工具中的交易內執行。

trans-unit.source: If an XML Web service method with a <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.TransactionOption%2A> property of `Required` or `RequiresNew` invokes another XML Web service method with a <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.TransactionOption%2A> property of `Required` or `RequiresNew`, each XML Web service method participates in its own transaction, because an XML Web service method can only act as the root object in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML Web 服務方法使用<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.TransactionOption%2A>屬性`Required`或`RequiresNew`與另一個 XML Web 服務方法會叫用<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.TransactionOption%2A>屬性`Required`或`RequiresNew`，自己在參與的每個 XML Web service 方法交易，因為 XML Web 服務方法可以只做為根物件，在交易中。

trans-unit.source: Item
trans-unit.target: 項目

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Disabled
trans-unit.target: 已停用

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the XML Web service method does not run within the scope of a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML Web service 方法不會在交易範圍內執行。

trans-unit.source: When a request is processed, the XML Web service method is executed without a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 當處理要求時，會執行 XML Web service 方法，而交易。

trans-unit.source: [WebMethod(TransactionOption= `TransactionOption.Disabled`)]
trans-unit.target: [WebMethod(TransactionOption= `TransactionOption.Disabled`)]

trans-unit.source: NotSupported
trans-unit.target: NotSupported

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the XML Web service method does not run within the scope of a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML Web service 方法不會在交易範圍內執行。

trans-unit.source: When a request is processed, the XML Web service method is executed without a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 當處理要求時，會執行 XML Web service 方法，而交易。

trans-unit.source: [WebMethod(TransactionOption= `TransactionOption.NotSupported`)]
trans-unit.target: [WebMethod(TransactionOption= `TransactionOption.NotSupported`)]

trans-unit.source: Supported
trans-unit.target: 支援

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the XML Web service method does not run within the scope of transactions.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML Web service 方法不會執行的交易範圍內。

trans-unit.source: When a request is processed, the XML Web service is created without a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 當處理要求時，XML Web service 會建立不使用交易。

trans-unit.source: [WebMethod(TransactionOption= `TransactionOption.Supported`)]
trans-unit.target: [WebMethod(TransactionOption= `TransactionOption.Supported`)]

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: 必要

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the XML Web service method requires a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML Web service 方法需要交易。

trans-unit.source: Since XML Web service methods can only participate as the root object in a transaction, a new transaction will be created for the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 因為 XML Web 服務方法可以只做為根物件，在交易中，XML Web 服務方法會建立新的交易。

trans-unit.source: [WebMethod(TransactionOption= `TransactionOption.Required`)]
trans-unit.target: [WebMethod(TransactionOption= `TransactionOption.Required`)]

trans-unit.source: RequiresNew
trans-unit.target: RequiresNew

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the XML Web service method requires a new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML Web service 方法需要新的交易。

trans-unit.source: When a request is processed, the XML Web service is created within a new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 當處理要求時，新的交易內建立 XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: [WebMethod(TransactionOption= `TransactionOption.RequiresNew`)]
trans-unit.target: [WebMethod(TransactionOption= `TransactionOption.RequiresNew`)]

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown from or not caught by an XML Web service method, the transaction is automatically aborted.
trans-unit.target: 如果從擲回或 XML Web 服務方法不會攔截例外狀況，會自動中止交易。

trans-unit.source: If no exceptions occur the transaction is automatically committed unless the method explicitly calls `SetAbort`.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有發生例外狀況交易是自動進行認可，除非方法明確地呼叫`SetAbort`。

trans-unit.source: The example below begins a new transaction when the `Transfer` method is called.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例開始新交易時`Transfer`方法呼叫。
